About Me

I want to tell you a few things...

Biography

I am 23 years old. From Serbia, Golubinci. My journey of programming starts when I was waitress and bartender. I was trying to learn html and css as I was working every day. I wasn't content with how much I was learning. So I decide to quit, and dedicate myself to learning something completely new for me. As I was learning more and more, I start liking the power of making even small things. As I was making more complicated things the satisfaction was bigger. So I fell in love. And here I am now, with much more knowledge but also with awareness of hove many things I still don't know. I am trying not to be hard on myself if I didn't learn enough that day, of didn't at all. It's just that there is so much to learn. I am also passionate animal and nature lover.

Skils

HTML5

CSS3

SASS

JAVASCRIPT

ECMA6

BOOTSTRAP

My goals

In this moment I am improving all the code. I want it to be clean understandable code with newest features. Also, learning React, so i am at the begining of the journey of becoming a good developer with great skills. Main goal is to learn something new every day and make projects I would be proud of.
